Text:
Hi Bone! Thx for the UL! 

Just wondering if we can get a little clarification on if this is a stand alone film or a compilation of the 5 Transformers Prime: Darkness Rising Eps, seen here:

Thank you again, BONE, and will seed for 2 weeks. My best!
